            <span class="comments-comment-meta__description-title">
              <!---->✚ Sina S.<!---->
            </span><span class="comments-comment-meta__data">
                <span class="white-space-pre"> </span>• 2nd<!---->

      <button aria-label="Open reactions menu" aria-expanded="false" id="ember2118" class="artdeco-button artdeco-button--muted artdeco-button--2 artdeco-button--tertiary ember-view reactions-menu__trigger" data-finite-scroll-hotkey="l"><!---->

        <svg role="none" aria-hidden="true" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" width="16" height="16" viewBox="0 0 16 16" data-supported-dps="16x16" data-test-icon="caret-small">

<!---->    </div>
<!----></div>
          
    </div>
  </div>


<!---->

        <a class="EvQUJBaxIRgFetdTQjAXvpGhCNvVbYEbE  comments-comment-meta__image-link" aria-label="View Hossein Heydari’s profile" target="_self" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/hossein-heydari79" data-test-app-aware-link="">

                      <div dir="ltr" class="update-components-text relative">
    <span dir="ltr"><!---->1. Introduction to spectroscopy (pavia)<!----><span><br></span><!---->2. Organic chemistry (morison and boyd)<!----><span><br></span><!---->3. Fundamental of analytical chemistry (skoog and West)<!----><span><br></span><!---->4. Principles and practice of analytical chemistry (fifield and kealey)<!----><span><br></span><!---->5. Spectrometeic identification of organic compounds (silverstein and Webster and kiemle)<!----><span><br></span><!---->6. Modern analytical chemistry (David Harvey)<!----><span><br></span><!---->هر کدوم که بشه من استقبال میکنم 😁<!----></span>
</div>

        <div class="flex-wrap justify-center
            artdeco-button__text align-items-center">

                react-button__text--like">

            </span>
        </div>

    <use href="#caret-small" width="16" height="16"></use>
</svg>

      
</span></button>
    </span>
  <span class="comments-comment-social-bar__social-counts-separator t-12 t-black--light t-normal
            pr1"></span>
        <button class="comments-comment-social-bar__reactions-count--cr
            hoverable-link-text

</svg>

  <span class="comments-comment-social-bar__social-counts-separator t-12 t-black--light t-normal
            pr1"></span>

            hoverable-link-text

          <h3 class="comments-comment-meta__description">
            <span class="comments-comment-meta__description-title">
              <!---->Hootan Hemmati<!---->
            </span><span class="comments-comment-meta__data">

                pr1"></span>
          <span aria-hidden="true" class="comments-comment-social-bar__replies-count">
            4 Replies
          </span>
          <span class="visually-hidden">
            4 Replies on Mohammad Reza Sari’s comment
          </span>    </div>

                      " tabindex="-1">
      
                    <span class="comments-comment-item__main-content feed-shared-main-content--comment t-14 t-black t-normal" dir="rtl">

        <a class="EvQUJBaxIRgFetdTQjAXvpGhCNvVbYEbE  comments-comment-meta__image-link" aria-label="View Hosein Ali Shakouri’s profile" target="_self" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/hosein-ali-shakouri-865b98219" data-test-app-aware-link="">

        <a class="EvQUJBaxIRgFetdTQjAXvpGhCNvVbYEbE  tap-target overflow-hidden" aria-label="View: Amir Hossein Agha Alikhani • 1st Attended shahid babaii" target="_self" href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/alikhani-dev" data-test-app-aware-link="">
          <h3 class="comments-comment-meta__description">
            <span class="comments-comment-meta__description-title">
              <!---->Amir Hossein Agha Alikhani<!---->
            </span><span class="comments-comment-meta__data">
                <span class="white-space-pre"> </span>• 1st<!---->
              </span><!----></h3><div class="comments-comment-meta__description-subtitle">
              Attended shahid babaii
            </div></a>

          <h3 class="comments-comment-meta__description">
            <span class="comments-comment-meta__description-title">
              <!---->Ronak Hemati<!---->
            </span><span class="comments-comment-meta__data">
